entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 02:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with snow squalls near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
